thread.title: Diego Costa to sign new Chelsea contract: Deal worth £57m after China snub - report
thread.title_full: Diego Costa to sign new Chelsea contract: Deal worth £57m after China snub - report

title: Diego Costa to sign new Chelsea contract: Deal worth £57m after China snub - report
text: Diego Costa to sign new Chelsea contract: Deal worth £57m after China snub - report Chelsea are reportedly set to make Diego Costa their highest paid player with the striker snubbing China. PUBLISHED: 22:08,  27, Tue, Feb 14, 2017 Antonio Conte has remained convinced the Spain international’s future remains in west London. Last month, a switch to the Chinese Super League looked on the cards following a bust-up between Costa and Conte. However, they held clear-the-air talks with the 28-year-old back in the first XI at Stamford Bridge. And according to The Sun , Costa and his representatives has reached an agreement in principle over a new contract. GETTY Diego Costa is Chelsea's top scorer this season with a Premier League title within reach Antonio Conte's hilarious reaction as Simon Mignolet saves Diego Costa penalty Wed, February 1, 2017 Antonio Conte found it difficult to hide his emotions after Simon Mignolet saved Diego Costa's penalty during Chelsea's 1-1 draw with Liverpool at Anfield
